licence_overview:
For imports within the EU, no licence is required, but the Fish Health Inspectors of the Fisheries Research Services (FRS) must be informed at least 24 hours prior to the proposed movement. 

For more information contact:  

$C  
**Marine Scotland Helpline**  
**Telephone:**  01224 876 544  
$C  

*[FRS]: Fisheries Research Services
*[EU]: European Union
licence_short_description: You need to tell the Fish Research Services if you import live crustaceans from within the EU.
overview: You need to tell the Fish Research Services if you import live crustaceans from within the EU
title: Licence to import live crustaceans (Scotland)
